content.text: I was wondering what your favorite exotic place you have been is?
I just got back from a trip to France and I loved it. It was a beautiful country with a lot to see and do.
Oh that sounds amazing! I have always wanted to go to France.
You should definitely go! It was one of my favorite trips ever.
I'm sure it was! I will have to add it to my list.
You should! It's a beautiful place.
So what did you like to do there?
We spent a lot of time exploring the city of Paris. We went to the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre, and the Palace of Versailles. We also took a day trip to the countryside and visited a few small towns.
That sounds amazing! I would love to see all of those places.
It was a lot of fun. We were really lucky with the weather too. It was sunny and warm the whole time we were there.
That's perfect! I'm sure it was even more beautiful with the sun out.
It was! We had a great time.
Well I'm glad to hear that! I'm sure it was an amazing trip.
